title: Eroge Reincarnation, Struggle of a Golden Pig Aristocrat Against Fate - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Romance   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Age Progression   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Butlers   Character Growth   Complex Family Relationships   Cowardly Protagonist   Crafting   Dense Protagonist   Doting Parents   Elemental Magic   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Empires   Fallen Nobility   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Fat Protagonist   Fat to Fit   Galge   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harsh Training   Kingdom Building   Kingdoms   Knights   Late Romance   Lost Civilizations   Loyal Subordinates   Magic   Magic Formations   Maids   Male Protagonist   Management   Manipulative Characters   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Sadistic Characters   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Time Skip   Transmigration   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong   Wizards
author: Nanashi no Gonbee   名無しの権兵衛
description:
I went to bed after completing the blockbuster eroge game that had become a trending topic in the past few days. When I woke up, I noticed something was different. Somehow, and for some reason, I got reincarnated in the initial stage of the same game that I was playing before.

The most concerning part was my character. I was playing the role of a character who challenges the hero and gets defeated. In addition, all the routes of this particular character have been confirmed death.

I got reincarnated as an underdog, and the situation is even worse, because someone has already defeated me in a duel. I can’t escape death anymore. But I won’t give up. I have the knowledge of the eroge game that I had cleared in my previous life. I will make full use of it and try to survive.

This is a story about our hero who got reincarnated as an eroge underdog character, and is trying his hardest to survive.>
